The decorative magic robe top can be bought from the Castle Wars lobby for 40 Castle wars tickets. The item set can be purchased from Lanthus. It requires level 20 Magic to wear.

The decorative magic robe top is a good option for 1 defence pures as it provides good defence bonuses for only requiring 20 Magic. It provides the same bonuses (and costs the same amount of tickets) as the Decorative armour (ranged top).

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Castle Wars mage armour set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 May 2017
(update | poll)

The price of the decorative magic robe top was reduced from 80 Castle Wars tickets to 40. If a player bought one before the update, they can speak to Lanthus, found in the Castle Wars lobby, to reclaim 40 tickets.

The '''decorative magic robe top''' can be bought from the [[Castle Wars]] lobby for 40 [[Castle wars ticket]]s. The item set can be purchased from [[Lanthus]]. It requires level 20 [[Magic]] to wear.

The decorative magic robe top is a good option for 1 defence pures as it provides good defence bonuses for only requiring 20 Magic. It provides the same bonuses (and costs the same amount of tickets) as the [[Decorative armour (ranged top)]].
